text: Grand Theft Auto III is a 2001 open world video game that is the third main entry of the Grand Theft Auto franchise. ==Development== Due to the September 11 attacks, the police cars have been redesigned from their NYPD look to a more generic look and a mission involving hijacking a plane has been removed. ==Reception== Many people at the time considered the game groundbreaking yet controversial at the same time. ==Home Media== Category:2001 video games Category:Grand Theft Auto Category:Rockstar Games games Category:Action- adventure games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Cancelled Nintendo GameCube games Category:Impact of the September 11 attacks Category:IOS games Category:MacOS games Category:Open-world video games Category:Organized crime video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation Network games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games about the illegal drug trade Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
title: Grand Theft Auto III
